channel.title: 98. 三方库 on 《React 18 step by step》
channel.description: Recent content in 98. 三方库 on 《React 18 step by step》

item.title: classnames 使用对象管理 className
item.description: 项目地址: https://github.com/JedWatson/classnames 安装方式 npm install classnames Demo import classNames from 'classnames'; classNames('foo', 'bar'); // => 'foo bar' classNames('foo', { bar: true }); // => 'foo bar' classNames({ 'foo-bar': true }); // => 'foo-bar' classNames({ 'foo-bar': false }); // => '' classNames({ foo: true }, { bar: true }); // => 'foo bar' classNames({ foo: true, bar: true }); // => 'foo bar' // lots of arguments of various types classNames('foo', { bar: true, duck: false }, 'baz', { quux: true }); // => 'foo bar baz quux' // other falsy values are just ignored classNames(null, false, 'bar', undefined, 0, { baz: null }, ''); // => 'bar'

item.title: uuid
